traits.name: Hold Breath
entries: The walrus can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The walrus makes two attacks: one with its body flop and one with its tusks.

actions.name: Body Flop
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (2d8 + 6 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Tusks
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 16 (3d6 + 6 damage) piercing damage.
